read_directory=aligned_reads_SNScontrol_Tb427-2018-55_bowtie2/PCF_subsamples/                    
# path to aligned reads

output_dir=StrandSpecific_norrowPeaks_RNASE_p05_Tb427-2018_p005_subsamplePCF
# output directory name (generated by the script in the working directory)

file_prefix=aln-pe_TB_trimmed_unique_sorted_reheadered_dups-removed                 
# prefix of mapped reads ($sample$prefix.bam)

input_list=("PCF_subs0_control" "PCF_subs1_control" "PCF_subs2_control" "PCF_subs3_control" "PCF_subs4_control" "PCF_subs5_control" "PCF_subs6_control" "PCF_subs7_control" "PCF_subs8_control" "PCF_subs9_control" "PCF_subs10_control" "PCF_subs11_control" "PCF_subs12_control" "PCF_subs13_control" "PCF_subs14_control" "PCF_subs15_control")      
# sample name as found in bam files 

overlap_list=(50)                                                  
# peak overlap to be excluded

window_list=(500)                                       
# window size for peak pair selection

with_control=true
